plugin.name: ThaumHelper
plugin.author: Jippen
plugin.purpose: Is there a lot of magic in the air? Skip the thaumometer, and get a rough idea at a glance

trigger.match: There is the residual taste of magic in this place.
trigger.send: There is the residual taste of magic in this place. (50-149 Thaums)

trigger.match: This place has seen some use of magic.
trigger.send: This place has seen some use of magic. (150-299 Thaums)

trigger.match: A considerable amount of magic has been used here.
trigger.send: A considerable amount of magic has been used here. (300-499 Thaums)

trigger.match: A very large quantity of magic has been manipulated here.
trigger.send: A very large quantity of magic has been manipulated here. (500-749 Thaums)

trigger.match: You can feel the Dungeon Dimensions trying to push in.
trigger.send: You can feel the Dungeon Dimensions trying to push in. (750-1000 Thaums)

trigger.match: Little sparks flash in from the Dungeon Dimensions.
trigger.send: Little sparks flash in from the Dungeon Dimensions. (1001-1500)

trigger.match: Apparations of things with lots of tentacles seem to be on the edge of your vision.
trigger.send: Apparations of things with lots of tentacles seem to be on the edge of your vision. (1501-2000 Thaums)

trigger.match: So much magic has been expended here that the area is in danger of dumping itself into the Dungeon Dimensions.
trigger.send: So much magic has been expended here that the area is in danger of dumping itself into the Dungeon Dimensions. (2000+ Thaums)
